thread.title: This 5-Year-Old Proves You're Never Too Young To Be A Feminist
thread.title_full: This 5-Year-Old Proves You're Never Too Young To Be A Feminist

author: Taylor Pittman
title: This 5-Year-Old Proves You're Never Too Young To Be A Feminist
text:
This 5-Year-Old Proves You're Never Too Young To Be A Feminist She's sharp as a tack and all about gender equality. By Taylor Pittman 
Need a refresher course on feminism ? This 5-year-old can help. 
In a video from Channel 4 for its documentary series “The Secret Life of 4, 5 and 6-Year-Olds,” a 5-year-old named Eva proves to the world that you’re never too young to be a feminist . 
Throughout the video, Eva talks about the importance of women voting and shuts down a boy who thinks women can’t be scientists. 
“I extracted the DNA from a banana once,” Eva says. 
Channel 4 posted the video on Twitter, prompting viewers to share their love for Eva. COME THROUGH EVA, MY FEMINIST QUEEN #slo5yo — david chipakupaku (@DavidChippa) February 9, 2017 Eva is my new feminist icon. https://t.co/jIkMrw4gmT — Cath Poucher (@CathPoucher) February 17, 2017 @Channel4 @sam_conrad1 My god that girl, what absolute bad ass! I love her! She gives me so much hope for future generations. pic.twitter.com/43ZWjmjTgb
